title: Tea Time (ASMR Ramble)
description: On episode 202 of Sleep and Relax ASMR, I ramble about tea flavors, thermostats, and more. Sit back, relax, and enjoy my mindless ramble! Visit www.GravityBlankets.com and use promo code PODCASTPROMO at checkout for 15% off your order.
